8a958182-a067-4a00-9fea-56f5da4efaeb.description: Individuals who earn GitLab Git Certified Associate certification are able to explain what GitLab is and why teams use it, perform basic Git commands for branching, merging, and remote work, and apply fundamental concepts and skills using GitLab within the DevOps lifecycle.
8a958182-a067-4a00-9fea-56f5da4efaeb.name: GitLab Certified Git Associate

badge_template_activities.title: GitLab Certified Git Associate is a technical certification offered by GitLab Professional Services to help the GitLab community and team members validate their ability to apply GitLab in their daily DevOps work. To earn a certification, candidates must first pass a 1-hour written assessment, followed by a 2-hour hands-on lab assessment graded by GitLab Professional Services engineers.

57dc71ca-d182-4523-9a4e-fa934773428f.description: Individuals who earn the GitLab Certified CI/CD Associate certification are able to define what CI/CD is, identify the key components needed for a CI/CD pipeline, explain GitLabs’s CI/CD functions, and understand how to utilize GitLab's CI/CD functions.
57dc71ca-d182-4523-9a4e-fa934773428f.name: GitLab Certified CI/CD Associate

badge_template_activities.title: GitLab Certified CI/CD Associate is a technical certification offered by GitLab Professional Services to help the GitLab community and team members validate their ability to apply GitLab concurrent DevOps processes and best practices in their daily work. To earn certification, candidates must first pass a 1-hour written assessment, followed by a 1-hour hands-on lab assessment graded by GitLab Professional Services engineers.

8d0af859-1be7-4636-bfd9-028d0e038b60.description: Individuals who earn the GitLab Project Management Specialist certification are able to define the Agile PM process, set up projects by creating issues, labels, milestones, and groups; manage projects using GitLab boards, epics, and roadmaps, as well as use GitLab to develop their portfolio plans.
8d0af859-1be7-4636-bfd9-028d0e038b60.name: GitLab Certified Project Management Associate

badge_template_activities.title: GitLab Certified Project Management Associate is a technical certification offered by GitLab Professional Services to help the GitLab community and team members validate their ability to use GitLab for lean and agile project management, from basic issue tracking to scrum and agile style project management throughout the complete DevOps lifecycle. To earn certification, candidates must first pass a written assessment, followed by a hands-on lab assessment graded by GitLab Professional Services.

95a01be1-c480-41f2-8416-fb56002b52cf.description: This is the basic training for sales and the prerequisite for pre-sales technical professionals. The curriculum provides an overview of the market GitLab services, customer personas and needs, GitLab solutions and positioning of GitLab.
95a01be1-c480-41f2-8416-fb56002b52cf.name: GitLab Sales Core Verified Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the GitLab Sales Core training and score above 80% on the tests.

f647ef44-d81e-4b10-8d74-deb5680c2b54.description: Individuals who earn GitLab Certified Security Specialist certification can showcase their ability to enable essential security capabilities of GitLab including SAST, DAST, dependency and container scanning, license compliance, and policy management to ensure more secure software releases.
f647ef44-d81e-4b10-8d74-deb5680c2b54.name: GitLab Certified Security Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: GitLab Certified Security Specialist is a technical certification offered by GitLab Professional Services to help the GitLab community and team members validate their ability to apply GitLab Security features and best practices in their daily work. To earn certification, candidates must first pass a 1-hour knowledge assessment, followed by a 1-hour hands-on lab assessment graded by GitLab Professional Services engineers.

744dd93c-3e01-40aa-be40-531b7fce767f.description: Individuals who earn the GitLab Professional Services Engineer certification are able to demonstrate hands-on proficiency implementing GitLab, and are able to articulate the most common GitLab customer use cases.
744dd93c-3e01-40aa-be40-531b7fce767f.name: GitLab Certified Services Engineer Professional

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this certification, candidates must earn GitLab Certified Git Certified Associate, GitLab Certified CI/CD Associate, GitLab Project Management Associate, GitLab Certified Security Specialist, GitLab Migration Services Specialist, and GitLab Implementation Services Specialist.

14ec9ee7-d0e2-4868-a1b7-e5673a0378fb.description: To be able to scale the availability of GitLab Migration Services, GitLab Professional Services offers a certification process for engineers who want to deliver this service to customers. The program is currently available to GitLab team members as well as selected GitLab Certified Services Partners. The certification validates the skills and knowledge needed to successfully migrate a customer's data from their legacy systems to GitLab.
14ec9ee7-d0e2-4868-a1b7-e5673a0378fb.name: GitLab Certified Migration Services Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this certification, candidates must successfully complete the following migration-related tasks: Review migration services resources, including documentation and delivery kits, pass a graded migration assessment, complete a congregate-onboarding workshop, shadow a migration that is lead by a PSE Migration Engineer, and lead a migration with a PSE Migration Engineer observing and providing feedback.

0bf14dcb-64ed-40fb-b323-be6cf060f267.description: Individuals who earn GitLab Certified Implementation Engineer Specialist certification are able to explain what GitLab install configurations are available and what components are used for implementations as well as, perform basic administrative actions in the GitLab system, and apply fundamental concepts and skills using GitLab.
0bf14dcb-64ed-40fb-b323-be6cf060f267.name: GitLab Certified Implementation Services Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: To earn certification, candidates must pass both a written assessment and a hands-on lab assessment.

238e5275-6709-4b89-bbe6-8d12c248df28.description: Individuals who have completed this pre-sales technical foundational training are able to explain the fundamentals of demonstrating, deploying, integrating and optimizing GitLab solutions.
238e5275-6709-4b89-bbe6-8d12c248df28.name: GitLab Solutions Architect Core Verified Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the GitLab Solutions Architect Core training and score above 80% on the knowledge assessments

998676ac-f708-43f1-8e11-105f551d32ad.description: Individuals who earn GitLab Certified DevOps Professional certification can showcase their ability to enable and use the fundamental DevOps capabilities of GitLab, from CI/CD to project management and security. These skill sets ensure certified individuals can make a significant impact by helping their organizations use GitLab to increase operational efficiency, accelerate delivery, and release innovate software products.
998676ac-f708-43f1-8e11-105f551d32ad.name: GitLab Certified DevOps Professional

badge_template_activities.title: To earn certification, candidates must have successfully achieved the following GitLab Certifications: GitLab Certified Git Associate, GiLab Certified CI/CD Associate, Gitlab Certified Project Management Associate, and GitLab Certified Security Specialist.

b4106416-917d-4a82-81d4-f586b6c1cf3d.description: The GitLab Continuous Integration Sales Specialist course provides learners with a fundamental framework of Continuous Integration (CI). At the end of this session you will be able identify target personas for a CI conversation, understand the CI Market, and position the GitLab CI solution.
b4106416-917d-4a82-81d4-f586b6c1cf3d.name: GitLab Continuous Integration Sales Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the GitLab DevSecOps training and score above 80% on the tests.

e996ef14-af01-402c-a57d-fadd69898003.description: The GitLab Sales Specialist in DevOps Platform will prepare learners with an understanding of the DevOps lifecycle and how to increase their customers organizations operational efficiencies. Upon the completion of this course learners will be able to define a DevOpsPlatform and be able to position GitLab as a singular DevOpsPlatform.
e996ef14-af01-402c-a57d-fadd69898003.name: GitLab DevOps Platform Sales Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Users must pass exams within the course with an 80% or better in order to earn accreditation.

5d7334bf-e311-4a9e-abd9-da2f92f1c8ba.description: The GitLab Sales Specialist in DevSecOps will prepare pre-sales professionals with industry relevant knowledge on the DevSecOps Market, Industry, and provide the best practices from GitLab in the DevSecOps space.
5d7334bf-e311-4a9e-abd9-da2f92f1c8ba.name: GitLab DevSecOps Sales Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Users must pass exams within the course with an 80% or better in order to earn accreditation.

fa435632-c800-4aee-899c-6326d353d2cc.description: The GitLab Agile Management Sales Specialist course will guide learners through the basics of Agile Management, the Agile Management Market, and the GitLab Agile Management Solution. At the end of this course, sales professionals will be able to position GitLab Agile Management as a part of the DevOpsPlatform solution.
fa435632-c800-4aee-899c-6326d353d2cc.name: GitLab Agile Management Sales Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Users must pass exams within the course with an 80% or better in order to earn accreditation.

66e27ad9-63c2-4500-8e10-2f1f04fac7e6.description: Individuals who have completed this certification are able to articulate GitLab solutions, ideal customer personas and needs, industry relevant insights, customer environments where opportunities for GitLab are most relevant, along with GitLab Advanced Use Case positioning.
66e27ad9-63c2-4500-8e10-2f1f04fac7e6.name: GitLab Sales Accredited Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the GitLab Sales Core foundational training plus a minimum of 2 (two) expanded Use Case trainings and score above 80% on the knowledge assessments.

6f7ee84e-8818-4fcd-96ed-18d637df0eec.description: Individuals who earn GitLab InnerSourcing Specialist certification are able to define what InnerSourcing is, identify the key components needed for InnerSourcing to be successful, assess how it will benefit their organization, explain GitLabs’s CI/CD functions, apply GitLab's permission model, describe GitLabs’s package and release stages, apply InnerSourcing best practices, and apply InnerSourcing functions within GitLab.
6f7ee84e-8818-4fcd-96ed-18d637df0eec.name: GitLab Certified InnerSourcing Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: To earn certification, candidates must first pass a 1-hour written assessment, followed by a 1-hour hands-on lab assessment graded by GitLab Professional Services engineers.

a588a0e6-04e5-484f-a460-bc6b5abf11e5.description: Individuals who have completed this foundational training are able to explain the fundamentals of success planning and be able to successfully build a success plan in Gainsight.
a588a0e6-04e5-484f-a460-bc6b5abf11e5.name: GitLab Success Plans Verified Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the training and score above 80% on the knowledge assessment, and successfully pass the practical assessment of building a success plan in Gainsight.

2426cc88-3cc0-4299-816d-dbae905620b3.description: Individuals who have completed this foundational training are able to describe the benefits of a pre-technical discovery call preparation, define the technical discovery call process steps, and evaluate the technical discovery call in a retrospective meeting.
2426cc88-3cc0-4299-816d-dbae905620b3.name: GitLab Technical Discovery Verified Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the training and score above 80% on the knowledge assessment, and successfully pass the technical discovery application exercise at 80% or better.

21a2503b-4ed9-4798-adb7-9fb10925e1f8.description: Individuals who earn the GitLab Certified Trainer - CI/CD certification are able to demonstrate confidence in presenting the course material, perform all necessary hands on labs and demonstrations, and apply best practices for training facilitation.
21a2503b-4ed9-4798-adb7-9fb10925e1f8.name: GitLab Certified Trainer - CI/CD

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this certification, candidates must receive a passing score from an evaluator on a dry-run facilitation of the course and a live presentation of the course, and must have also earned the GitLab Certified CI/CD Specialist certification.

545d2d00-f13a-43c3-982e-7759b4912743.description: Individuals who earn the GitLab Certified Trainer - GitLab with Git Basics certification are able to demonstrate confidence in presenting the course material, perform all necessary hands on labs and demonstrations, and apply best practices for training facilitation.
545d2d00-f13a-43c3-982e-7759b4912743.name: GitLab Certified Trainer- GitLab with Git Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this certification, candidates must receive a passing score from an evaluator on a dry-run facilitation of the course and a live presentation of the course, and must have also earned the GitLab Certified Associate certification.

4f55bfb9-9002-4411-a1cd-6f651826d59a.description: Individuals who earn the GitLab Certified Trainer - Project Management certification are able to demonstrate confidence in presenting the course material, perform all necessary hands on labs and demonstrations, and apply best practices for training facilitation.
4f55bfb9-9002-4411-a1cd-6f651826d59a.name: GitLab Certified Trainer- GitLab: Agile Project Management

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this certification, candidates must receive a passing score from an evaluator on a dry-run facilitation of the course and a live presentation of the course, and must have also earned the GitLab Project Management Specialist certification.

fc352a1d-70ac-41d3-88e8-991482ed38f3.description: Individuals who have completed this foundational training are able to build an impactful account plan in Gainsight. This includes completing the Customer Account Profile in Gainsight, documenting the account snapshot for an account plan in Gainsight, and creating the go-to-market plan in Gainsight.
fc352a1d-70ac-41d3-88e8-991482ed38f3.name: GitLab Account Planning Verified Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the training and score above 80% on the knowledge assessment, and successfully pass the account planning application exercise at 80% or better.

3c230096-0f4b-41bd-a69a-964ad66bd157.description: Individuals who earn the GitLab Certified Trainer - Security Essentials certification are able to demonstrate confidence in presenting the course material, perform all necessary hands on labs and demonstrations, and apply best practices for training facilitation.
3c230096-0f4b-41bd-a69a-964ad66bd157.name: GitLab Certified Trainer: GitLab Security Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this certification, candidates must receive a passing score from an evaluator on a dry-run facilitation of the course and a live presentation of the course, and must have also earned the GitLab Certified Security Specialist certification.

5592dbc3-553b-4ef9-a8d1-bff79d5385d2.description: This certification provides Professional Services Engagement Managers with the information they need to be able to position, scope, and sell GitLab professional Services. In the course learners will learn about the Professional Services value proposition and how it relates to the overall GitLab value proposition. You will gain insights into the processes that we use, the services that we can offer, and the collaboration we expect to have with our account teams and customers.
5592dbc3-553b-4ef9-a8d1-bff79d5385d2.name: GitLab Certified Engagement Manager Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Individuals who earn GitLab Certified Engagement Manager Professional certification are able to perform the following fundamental tasks: Work with Account Teams to gather info about a customer opportunity, Position the value of Professional Services, Perform discovery calls with customer, Understand GitLab service offerings to be able to build a proposal and cost estimate, Create Statements of Work (SOW) based on customer-approved estimates, and Gain appropriate approvals to close business

82c04110-80b2-4a75-a247-320bfcc5e6ec.description: Individuals who earn the GitLab Certified Trainer - DevOps Fundamentals certification are able to demonstrate confidence in presenting the course material, perform all necessary hands on labs and demonstrations, and apply best practices for training facilitation.
82c04110-80b2-4a75-a247-320bfcc5e6ec.name: GitLab Certified Trainer - DevOps Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this certification, candidates must receive a passing score from an evaluator on a dry-run facilitation of the course and a live presentation of the course, and must have also earned the GitLab DevOps Professional certification.

e3f228c1-63ad-4981-9fd6-1378e55ddbe9.description: Individuals who earn the GitLab Certified Trainer - System Administration certification are able to demonstrate confidence in presenting the course material, perform all necessary hands on labs and demonstrations, and apply best practices for training facilitation of System Administration Basics and Advanced System Administration.
e3f228c1-63ad-4981-9fd6-1378e55ddbe9.name: GitLab Certified Trainer - System Administration

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this certification, candidates must receive a passing score from an evaluator on a dry-run facilitation of the course and a live presentation of the course.
